alert.note: Alert for Finney (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 05 at 5:23PM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Finney County through 600 PM CDT... At 523 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Plymell, moving west at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Plymell around 535 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
